name: Dmitri Volkov
family: Volkov Dynasty - controls the Obsidian System (industrial/mining)
title: Sovereign of the Obsidian Reaches
core_wound: His younger brother was killed 50 years ago in a suspicious accident involving Ashford interests; has never forgiven or forgotten; consumed by need for justice/vengeance
wants: To see the Ashford family brought low and his brother's death acknowledged
needs: To let go of vengeance and find peace; to realize revenge won't bring his brother back
voice_markers: Rough, working-class accent despite his noble position (intentional - pride in industrial roots)
Uses mining and industrial metaphors constantly
Gruff and direct - hates flowery language
Frequently curses in old Russian (Volkov family tradition)
contradiction: Presents as rough working-class hero but has become as aristocratic and removed from common people as those he despises; fights corruption while being corrupted by power
physical_description: Massive and intimidating despite his advanced age. Extensive longevity treatments show in the metallic sheen to his skin. Bald with a white beard. Missing two fingers on left hand from mining accident in youth (refused regeneration as reminder of his roots). Wears industrial-style formal wear.

relationships.Lysander_Ashford: Bitter enemy for 50 years; mutual hatred but also grudging respect; trapped in cycle of retaliation
relationships.Nikolai_Volkov: Grandson and heir (age 25); loves him but pushes him too hard to hate the Ashfords; doesn't realize he's pushing him away
relationships.Cassandra_Ashford: Secret negotiation partner; impressed by her intelligence; doesn't know she's manipulating him for peace
relationships.Irina_Volkov: Deceased wife (died 20 years ago); still mourns her; she was the one who could temper his rage
relationships.Pavel_Volkov: Deceased younger brother; his death 50 years ago set Dmitri on path of vengeance
relationships.Zara_Volkov: Granddaughter (age 22); firebrand who wants to radicalize the workers; he fears she'll start a war

secrets: Has been in secret contact with Cassandra Ashford to negotiate peace
His brother's death might have been an accident after all - he has evidence he's been suppressing
Suffering from heart condition that longevity treatments can't fix; has maybe 10 years left
Secretly proud of Zara's revolutionary spirit though he publicly condemns it
Has illegally enhanced his grandson Nikolai with genetic modifications to make him a 'perfect heir'
knowledge_state: Deep understanding of industrial systems and mining operations
Knows many secrets about resource distribution and illegal trade
Aware of growing revolutionary sentiment among workers (his own family encouraged it)
Does not know that Nikolai resents the pressure to hate the Ashfords
Does not know Zara is planning actual armed revolt
